name: Cozyverse
description: Cozyverse is a gaming studio and one of web3's most active gaming communities.

missions.name: Rescue the Woofys
missions.description: Woofys crash landed onto Polar Peaks, and are stuck in their capsules. Rescue them!

quests.name: Rescue a Woofy
quests.description: Rescue a Woofy by opening a capsule.

tasks.name: Open a capsule.
tasks.description: Obtain a Woofy Capsule NFT, and reveal it by calling the reveal function or at the campsite (https://cozyverse.xyz/region/unknown/campsite).

badge.name: Woofy Savior
badge.description: Successfully rescued one or more Woofys
